price: Mereka ingin keluar dari neraka, padahal mereka sekali-kali tidak dapat keluar darinya, dan mereka beroleh azab yang kekal.
arabic: يُرِيدُونَ أَن يَخۡرُجُواْ مِنَ ٱلنَّارِ وَمَا هُم بِخَٰرِجِينَ مِنۡهَاۖ وَلَهُمۡ عَذَابٞ مُّقِيمٞ

version.title: Indonesian Translation - King Fahd Complex
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Indonesian by approved Committee by Indonesian Ministry of Islamic Affairs. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: yurīdūna an yakhrujū mina al-nāri wamā hum bikhārijīna min'hā walahum ʿadhābun muqīmun
